title: Every Kardashian photoshop fail of past six months shows 'they won't stop altering pics'
text:
Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

The Kardashians and Jenners are not shy when it comes to manipulating images before posting the pics online.

The Keeping Up With The Kardashians stars are often called out for altering their pics favourably but it hasn't always worked out that well.

Fans of the reality stars have often called them out for their fails and it seems there is no let up in this practice, if posts from the past six months are to go by.

Khloe turns CGI

The most recent photoshop fail by Khloe Kardashian has had her followers asking if she had become a CGI version of herself.

She posted a selfie with the caption "Happy Monday. Old photo but I like it," but she was rinsed on social media by many who believed that this was not a natural photo.

One fan exclaimed on Twitter , after Khloe turned off commenting on her Instagram pic: "Woah, that DOES NOT look like Khloé," you are not alone. Fans took to Twitter to express their disbelief in the photo.

Another fan asked: "You want me to believe THIS is Khloé Kardashian?"

(Image: khloe kardashian/Instagram)

(Image: Eric Charbonneau/REX/Shutterstoc)

Skims fail

Kim Kardashian had a few problems with her shapewear line, which was originally called Kimono.

There was such a backlash against the name, Kim decided to withdraw it and launched as Skims instead.

Among the first official pics of the range, there were questions as to whether Kim had been edited in the pic.

It was difficult to spot at first but there were questions about Kim's left side and left arm, which doesn't seem to match up.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Six-toed Kim

One of the more infamous fails of recent times has been the KKW x Kylie fragrance launch involving Kim and Kylie Jenner .

Posing while wearing one-legged bodysuits, fans were soon calling out Kim over a weird body transformation, in which she appeared to have six toes.

Once people had seen that they just couldn't stop seeing it and it freaked them out.

(Image: Twitter)

Kim confusion

When Kim decided to share one of her newest KKW beauty collections, she plumped for a selfie, which is standard practice among the Kardashians.

She was soon being called out by her followers though, who felt the pic was so 'perfect' that they questioned whether it was completely natural.

One upset fan wrote: "So photoshopped you don't even look like yourself anymore, Kim."

Another commented: " Umm...Kim is so stunning but this doesn't look like her."

(Image: Instagram)

Holiday blues

Kylie Jenner may strive to show the best version of herself at all times, that it sometimes seems that some digital help has been required.

In a pic from a holiday with one of her besties, Stassie Karanikolaou, it would seem that her friend was subjected to some over zealous editing.

Closer look at her leg shows that she is either wasting away or has been subjected to some cheeky manipulation.

(Image: Instagram)

Khloe, is that you?

When Khloe and Kylie teamed up for a cosmetics collaboration, there was always going to be a glamorous photoshoot to accompany it.

Instead of the product they were promoting, there was much consternation about the image that had been shared.

It would seem that fans of the pair were left reeling as they believed the image had been edited so much that they no longer looked like Khloe and Kylie.

One user commented: "Where is Khloe?"

(Image: Instagram)

Another wrote: "Didn't even realise it was Khloé and Kylie... these girls are so photoshopped they're unrecognisable."

Failing with filters

Poor Khloe is the subject of another Photoshop fail when it comes to the use of filters, according to her fans.

While her picture comment asked for "good vibes only," what she got was another dressing down as to what her image was so heavily filtered.

(Image: Instagram)

There were claims among her fans that Khloe's face had been filtered so much that a mole had disappeared from view.

It wouldn't have been so bad but Khloe was passingthe pic off as being natural and that was where there was ire among her followers.

description: The Keeping Up With The Kardashians stars seem to have a love of photo manipulation but recent efforts show they are not masters of it
